key.name: autosave
key.description: Whether to autosave the files or not, when the tasks are changed

key.name: autoreload
key.description: Whether to auto reload the file when it is changed externally or not

key.name: restore-session
key.description: Whether to try to restore files opened in last session or not

key.name: files
key.description: The URI's of files in last session

key.name: vertically-center-tasks
key.description: Whether to vertically center tasks or not in the tasks view

key.name: hidden-tasks
key.description: Whether to hide tasks if h:1 is set

key.name: render-pango-markup
key.description: Whether to render pango markup in task descriptions
